what: chinadevfin3: An R Package for AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — chinadevfin3-package
title: chinadevfin3: An R Package for AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — chinadevfin3-package
text: `chinadevfin3` package working AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset. dataset includes 20,985 Chinese development finance projects across 165 countries worth $1.34 trillion 2000-2021. `chinadevfin3` provides easy way R users load dataset, helper functions ease common analysis workflows.

title: chinadevfin3: An R Package for AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — chinadevfin3-package

title: AidData Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset, Version 3.0 — gcdf3_dataset
text: dataset captures 20,985 projects across 165 low- middle-income countries supported loans grants official sector institutions China worth $1.34 trillion. tracks projects 22 commitment years (2000-2021) provides details timing project implementation 24-year period (2000-2023).

title: AidData Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset, Version 3.0 — gcdf3_dataset
Standardized Country Names — gcdf3_standardized_countrynames
text: tibble providing standardized country names, iso3c codes, column filter country-specific regional projects. Country names standardized using countrycode::countryname().

title: Standardized Country Names — gcdf3_standardized_countrynames
Standardized Country Names — gcdf3_standardized_countrynames
text: tibble 154 rows 4 variables: recipient chr loan recipient listed recipient column gcdf3_dataset. See gcdf3_data_dictionary details. country_name chr standardized country name provided countrycode::countryname(). project regional, region listed recipient used. iso3c chr iso3c country code can helpful joining country features. Projects recipient region NA values. country_or_regional chr column allow filtering country-based lending regional lending.

what: Load the AidData Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — get_gcdf3_dataset
title: Load the AidData Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — get_gcdf3_dataset
text: get_gcdf3_dataset() makes easy load AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset, Version 3.0 (GCDF 3.0). default, function adds standardized country names make easier merge datasets.  standardized country names described documentation gcdf3_standardized_countrynames. Setting standardized_countrynames = FALSE equivalent simply calling gcdf3_dataset data object.  data definitions available gcdf3_data_dictionary.

title: Load the AidData Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — get_gcdf3_dataset
Load the AidData Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — get_gcdf3_dataset
text: standardized_countrynames set TRUE default, argument attaches standardized country names make easier join dataset datasets.

title: Load the AidData Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — get_gcdf3_dataset
Load the AidData Global Chinese Development Finance 3.0 Dataset — get_gcdf3_dataset
code: # returns the GCDF 3.0 dataset, with standardized country names get_gcdf3_dataset() #> # A tibble: 20,985 × 129 #>    country_name iso3c country_or_regional aid_data_record_id #>    <chr>        <chr> <chr>                            <int> #>  1 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          94556 #>  2 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          94564 #>  3 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          94565 #>  4 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          94567 #>  5 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          94568 #>  6 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          94613 #>  7 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          94619 #>  8 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          95312 #>  9 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          95322 #> 10 Afghanistan  AFG   country                          95323 #> # ℹ 20,975 more rows #> # ℹ 125 more variables: recommended_for_aggregates <chr>, #> #   aid_data_parent_id <chr>, umbrella <chr>, financier_country <chr>, #> #   recipient <chr>, recipient_iso_3 <chr>, recipient_region <chr>, #> #   commitment_year <int>, implementation_start_year <int>, #> #   completion_year <int>, title <chr>, description <chr>, #> #   staff_comments <chr>, status <chr>, intent <chr>, flow_type <chr>, …  # returns the GCDF 3.0 dataset as-is. get_gcdf3_dataset(standardized_countrynames = FALSE) #> #
